title: Emerald Rose - Archives of Ages to Come
description:
<* Personal Thoughts *> 

Pagan music is rare and difficult to find here in the Bible belt, and 
seemingly more difficult to find in the file sharing communities I 
frequent. Which is why I'll be uploading a series of torrents of some of 
my favorite Pagan music. Are you not a Pagan? Don't listen to the 
music. I'd prefer this torrent not be the target of a childish argument 
about Paganism.

Emerald Rose is quite possibly one of my favorite Pagan bands. Their 
style ranges from classic folk tunes to original rock and/or pop songs. 
Their music draws a lot from Celtic and other mythology. Overall this is 
a must have for the folk song lover and pagan alike.



Tracks:

[#]Come to the Dance
[#]Before the Twilight Falls
[#]Take Me Down ( To Her Water )
[#]Four Doors to Elfland
[#]Queen of Argyll
[#]Three More Drops
[#]Autumn in Asheville
[#]Gwydion's Song to Lleu
[#]Wheel of Fortune
[#]Four Jacks
[#]Irish Heartbeat
[#]Dagger of the Moon
[#]Urania Sings
[#]Whistler's Farewell
[#]Dance of the Rats
[#]We Come From Monkeys



*Yes you too can create a torrent entry like this! That is, a torrent page 
which explains in a clear and concise manner what is contained within 
the torrent. All it takes is a little bit more time and a person who cares 
enough to do it.
